page.title: 14Recreation: Rosneath
page.content: There is a great deal of sport; senior and junior football teams. Junior run by school and senior by a few men. Girls can go to netball class also run by school. A lot of people go fishing, walking and play tennis. We are very lucky to have a tennis court and two football pitches. A lot of people in P7 class have snooker tables Many people also play household games like Monopoly, cards and other small games. People have many kinds of hobby Most popular is stamp collecting, then netball and then playing pool or snooker. There were many more. Time is also spent reading. Badminton is a very big game. It needs a very fit person to do most of these sports.
